# DotNetDocsSettings.ToolVersion property

The version of the `xmldocmd` tool to use when generating documentation.

```csharp
public string ToolVersion { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

Defaults to a stable version, which may change with new versions of Faithlife.Build, but will not change unless Faithlife.Build is updated.
